Yoga Mat with Adjustable Padded Support: Add adjustable padded support for different body types and yoga styles, such as a lumbar roll or wrist rest.
Yoga Mat with Built-in Straps: Add adjustable straps for added support and stability during various yoga poses, especially for beginners.
Yoga Mat with Integrated LED Lighting: Incorporate LED lights that light up the mat for better visibility during nighttime or low-light conditions.
Yoga Mat with Cooling/Heating Properties: Add temperature control features to the mat, such as cooling or heating elements, to enhance comfort during different weather conditions.
Yoga Mat with Built-in Speakers: Incorporate built-in speakers for playing guided meditations or yoga classes, providing a more immersive experience.
